1.caption_en:
Caption:
A timeline slide titled "RELEASE PLAN OF PIK 5.0" showing a staggered April–August release schedule with milestone markers for deliverables such as Core Canvases, Ecosystem Strategy, Platform Architecture (AWS), Data Flywheel (AWS), Financial Modeling, a whitepaper, and an on-demand course.

{
  "artifact_type": "presentation slide",
  "title": "RELEASE PLAN OF PIK 5.0",
  "subtitle": "In the next months we follow a staggered release plan for our advanced tools",
  "timeline_months": [
    "APRIL",
    "MAY",
    "JUNE",
    "JULY",
    "AUGUST"
  ],
  "visual_style": {
    "color_palette": [
      "teal",
      "orange",
      "red",
      "dark_gray"
    ],
    "marker_shapes": [
      "diamond",
      "square_bullets"
    ],
    "brand_logos": [
      "aws",
      "Platform Innovation Kit (logo at bottom-left)"
    ]
  },
  "milestones": [
    {
      "id": "m1",
      "name": "Core Canvases downloadable",
      "start_month": "APRIL",
      "end_month": "MAY",
      "shape": "square_bullets",
      "color": "teal",
      "notes": "Grouped with 'Double Loop Model' and 'Online User Guide'"
    },
    {
      "id": "m2",
      "name": "Double Loop Model",
      "start_month": "APRIL",
      "end_month": "MAY",
      "shape": "square_bullets",
      "color": "teal"
    },
    {
      "id": "m3",
      "name": "Online User Guide",
      "start_month": "APRIL",
      "end_month": "MAY",
      "shape": "square_bullets",
      "color": "teal"
    },
    {
      "id": "m4",
      "name": "Ecosystem Strategy",
      "start_month": "MAY",
      "shape": "diamond",
      "color": "orange"
    },
    {
      "id": "m5",
      "name": "Platform Architecture",
      "start_month": "JUNE",
      "shape": "diamond",
      "color": "orange",
      "notes": "Associated with AWS"
    },
    {
      "id": "m6",
      "name": "Data Flywheel",
      "start_month": "JULY",
      "shape": "diamond",
      "color": "orange",
      "notes": "Associated with AWS"
    },
    {
      "id": "m7",
      "name": "Whitepaper on B2B Platforms + Platforms 4 Future Alliance",
      "start_month": "JULY",
      "shape": "diamond",
      "color": "red"
    },
    {
      "id": "m8",
      "name": "On-Demand Online Course",
      "start_month": "JULY",
      "shape": "diamond",
      "color": "red"
    },
    {
      "id": "m9",
      "name": "Financial Modeling",
      "start_month": "AUGUST",
      "shape": "diamond",
      "color": "orange"
    }
  ],
  "footer": {
    "logo_text": "PLATFORM INNOVATION KIT",
    "position": "bottom-left"
  }
}
